item.title: Heart Disease Chatbot
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Proposed Model Overview System Architecture Agent interaction Installation Evaluation Introduction In this project undertaken for the Introduction to Machine Learning and Data Mining course, we address the critical issue of providing accurate and timely health information on cardiovascular diseases.
